## Checklist
- [ ] Follows Conventional Commits
- [ ] Passes `cargo test`
- [ ] Code is commented and documented
- [ ] Adheres to Rust style (clippy checks)
- [ ] No hard-coded secrets or credentials
- [ ] Logging / observability present
- [ ] Security considerations addressed
